metadata.title: CVE-2024-0749 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A phishing site could have repurposed an `about:` dialog to show phishingcontent with an incorrect origin in the address bar. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 122, Firefox ESR < 115.7, and Thunderbird < 115.7.

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
